title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 8, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 8, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark get together and discuss some of the news coming out surrounding Dr. Fauci's emails and Mark teases a story that'll come up later in the week surrounding R. Kelly's legal representation. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
